stanzaliving - LEGAL COUNSEL – CONTRACTING

Location - GURGAON, Work Type: Full Time

Other July 01, 2022

Job Description:

  • Drafting of term sheets, agreement to lease, lease deeds, agreement to sell, sale deed, development agreements.
  • Understanding of land acquisition process including title search, due diligence, risk mitigation, stamping, registration of documents, mutation, approvals required for operating and running the business in the premises.
  • Draft, evaluate, negotiate and execute MOU, NDAs, service agreements, other commercial contracts etc.
  • Drafting and negotiating operation and maintenance agreements and all related agreements and transactions.
  • Establish and maintain relationships by serving as a single point of contact for contractual matters.
  • Provide land and property due diligence-related issue resolution, both with internal and external stakeholders.
  • Monitor and complete agreement closure with appropriate risk mitigation
  • Communicate contract-related information to all stakeholders
  • Contract Management, contractual compliances monitoring, and management, maintaining MIS
  • General corporate advisory

Who we are looking for:

  • Extremely high ownership, self-starter ability to get hands dirty, and work in a constantly-changing and fast-growing environment
  • Establish collaborative and trusting relationships with the businesss key internal leaders in order to ensure that there is a free flow of ideas and information across the business
  • First principle thinking and strong problem solving

Prior experience:

  • Good drafting and communication skills
  • Should have the ability to build very positive and close stakeholder working relationships
  • Self-motivator, flexible and able to work at pace
  • Work with positive spirit and discipline
  • Fast and smart decision making is critical, has the required agility and flexibility
  • Persistent with a high sense of ownership
  • Strong interpersonal and influencing skills, with a closure mindset
  • Demonstrate ability to work in a fast paced, hyper-normal growth environment
Apply
